summary: Request to expose a defaultConnection() method that can switch between localhost and cloud-based Temporal connections based on environment variables. This would enable sample repositories to easily run in cloud environments without code changes.
userImpact: Developers can more easily switch between localhost and cloud Temporal instances in sample code without manual modifications.
proposedFix: Expose a defaultConnection() method or similar utility that reads an environment variable to determine whether to connect to localhost or cloud.
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented to provide a connection configuration method that supports environment-based switching.
keyQuote: Expose a defaultConnection() method or similar that switches between localhost (default) and cloud based on some environment variable
